label: Niveau de monoxyde de carbone
description: Get the health concern level from a carbon monoxide sensor

carbonMonoxideHealthConcern.label: Niveau de monoxyde de carbone

supportedCarbonMonoxideValues.label: Supported carbon monoxide values
supportedCarbonMonoxideValues.description: The list of carbon monoxide health concern values that the device supports. Is optional, defaults to all values if not set.
